meanings.definition: A solemn promise or pledge, especially one made to a deity or a person.
meanings.sent1: She made a vow to always be honest with her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The couple exchanged vows of eternal love during their wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly made a vow to never eat broccoli again.
meanings.sent4: The vow to protect the environment is like a shield for future generations.
meanings.sent5: Her vow to study hard was as strong as a steel chain.

meanings.definition: To make a solemn promise or pledge.
meanings.sent1: They vow to support each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent2: I vow to always cherish our friendship.
meanings.sent3: He vowed to never be late for work again after oversleeping.
meanings.sent4: The team vowed to give their best performance in the upcoming match.
meanings.sent5: She vowed to never give up on her dreams, no matter the obstacles.
